bug.title: Economy is displayed as 0.00 km/L
bug.description:
``` What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Entered all the fillup data and goto History Tab 2. Click on one of the Fillup history 3. Stats section --> Economy is shown as 0.0 km/L
Expected behavior: should have displayed the mileage/economy by taking previous entry as start and current entry as finish / volume?
Actual behavior:
Mileage version: 3.1.1 Android version: 4.3 Device: Sony Xperia Z1
Please provide any additional information below. Please see the screen shot ```
Original issue reported on code.google.com by `raghaven...@gmail.com` on 26 Jan 2014 at 5:16
Attachments: - [Screenshot_2014-01-26-10-40-34.jpg](https://storage.googleapis.com/google-code-attachments/android-mileage/issue-64/comment-0/Screenshot_2014-01-26-10-40-34.jpg)
